thread.title: Olivia Desjardins
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Olivia Desjardins

author: Olivia Desjardins
title: Olivia Desjardins
text: I had called this Town Fair Tire in Norwhich after a bad expirance somewhere else. They were able to get me in that day quick and easy at a great price. The manager Dan went out of his way to make sure not only that we got a great deal but that I would also have a safe set of tires on my SUV for my travels back and forth from Connecticut to Vermont.
